The Tor Browser includes various privacy: The Tor Browser includes various privacy and security enhancements not present in other browsers.
One or more recipients have not performe: Jeden lub więcej odbiorców nie zalogowało się ani razu. Przez to nie będą oni otrzymywali zgłoszeń.
This user has not performed the first lo: Ten użytkownik nie zalogował się jeszcze ani razu.
Sending reports over HTTPS exposes the a:
Sending reports over HTTPS exposes the act of doing so, but not the content.

Also, hiding the fact that you are submitting something makes the report anonymous, which is strongly recommended.

This can be achieved with the use of the Tor Browser, providing anonymisation not found in other browsers.
Before proceeding, please set a new pass: Przed przejściem dalej proszę ustawić nowe hasło.
The chosen password is too weak. A valid: Wybrane hasło jest zbyt słabe. Poprawne hasło powinno mieć przynajmniej 10 znaków i zawierać różne znaki, a przynajmniej jedną małą literę, jedną wielką literę, jedną cyfrę i znak specjalny.
The new password must be different from: Nowe hasło musi być różne od poprzedniego

The two passwords do not match: Te dwa hasła nie są takie same

Using Let's Encrypt requires agreement t: Korzystanie z Let's Encrypt oznacza zgodę na ich regulamin
This interface can generate a Private Ke: This interface can generate a Private Key and a Certificate Signing Request. The Certificate Signing Request can be provided to a Certificate Authority to retrieve a Certificate. After having validated your request and your ownership of the hostname, the Certificate Authority will issue you a Certificate and provide a file containing Intermediate Certificates. Load the Certificate and the file containing the Intermediate Certificates to complete the HTTPS setup.
The platform supports the configuration: Platforma wspiera konfigurację HTTPS za pomocą tego interfejsu.
Using automatic HTTPS configuration will: Using automatic HTTPS configuration will handle the entire process of requesting, enabling and renewing certificates from the Let's Encrypt Certificate Authority.
The platform must be reachable through a: The platform must be reachable through a public IP address and the selected hostname must have a corresponding DNS record referencing that address.
The manual configuration wizard will gui: The manual configuration wizard will guide you through the setup of HTTPS from an alternative Certificate Authority.
Allowing whistleblowers to connect over: Zezwalanie sygnalistom na łączenie po HTTPS zachowuje ich prywatność, lecz niekoniecznie anonimowość.
Let the platform be reachable without To: Platforma może być osiągalna bez korzystania z Tor
Roles enabled to use the platform withou: Role osób mogących używać platformy bez Tora
Reset notification templates to default: Zresetuj szablony powiadomień do ustawień domyślnych
Number of hours before sending a report: Number of hours before sending a report expiration alert

The operation will reset the configurati: The operation will reset the configuration and cannot be undone.

Before proceeding please read carefully: Przed przejściem dalej uważnie przeczytaj dokumentację:
Make a copy and store it in a safe place: Zrób kopię i zapisz w bezpiecznym miejscu. Potrzebny będzie jak zapomnisz hasła, po to, by odzyskać konto bez utraty danych.
If you need technical support, have gene: Jak potrzebujesz wsparcia technicznego, masz ogólne pytania bądź pomysły:

Resource can only be accessed via the To: Dostęp do zasobów możliwy tylko poprzez sieć Tor.
Validation of email address change in pr: Weryfikacja zmiany adresu email w toku.
Please check your inbox for further inst: Sprawdź skrzynkę odbiorczą dla dalszych instrukcji.
Set up email encryption by providing a P: Ustaw szyfrowanie maili dostarczając klucz PGP
It appears that you are browsing this si: Wygląda na to, że przeglądasz tę stronę bez żadnych dodatkowych zabezpieczeń prywatności.
You are strongly advised to visit this s: Zdecydowanie zaleca się odwiedzenie tej strony za pomocą aplikacji Tor Browser chroniącej twoją tożsamość.
Then, copy and paste the following addre: Potem skopiuj i wklej ten adres do Tor Browser:
Error while uploading files; check below: Błąd przesyłania plików; zobacz niżej szczegóły.
Chat with us anonymously using the Ricoc: Rozmawiaj z nami anonimowo za pomocą aplikacji Ricochet
To chat with us use the following Ricoch: By z nami porozmawiać użyj następującego adresu Ricochet:
By using the Tor network and creating an: Używając sieci Tor i tworząc usługę Onion, Ricochet jest komunikatorem internetowym umożliwiającym rozmowę przy jednoczesnym zachowaniu prywatności i anonimowości, poprzez niezdradzanie lokalizacji i adresu IP. Nie zauważysz różnicy między tym a zwykłym czatem, poza tym, że będziesz używał unikalnego adresu zamiast numeru telefonu/maila/nazwy użytkownika.
The platform is still not configured for: Platforma wciąż nie ma skonfigurowanego HTTPS wobec czego powinna być używana tylko do testów.
Recipients have requested you to fill an: Odbiorcy proszą cię byś wypełnił/a dodatkową ankietę.
Are you sure that you want to delete the: Czy jesteś pewien, że chcesz usunąć ten krok?
Everything related to the report stored: Wszystko związane ze zgłoszeniem na platformie będzie skasowane.
Please be aware that everything stored o: Proszę pamiętać, że wszystko przechowywane poza platformą, np. pliki na twoim komputerze, będzie musiało zostać skasowane ręcznie.
Are you sure that you want to delete the: Na pewno chcesz skasować wybrane zgłoszenia?
Please make sure that all related data i: Proszę upewnij się czy wszystkie powiązane informacje zostały poprawnie skasowane i odbiorcy nie mają już do nich dostępu.
Are you sure that you want to postpone t: Czy jesteś pewien, że chcesz opóźnić datę wygaśnięcia Zgłoszenia?

Access to the whistleblower's identity h: Dozorca zażądał dostępu do tożsamości sygnalisty.
Your whistleblowing platform is almost r: Twoja platforma dla sygnalistów jest prawie gotowa!
Sprawdź swoją skrzynkę odbiorczą by ją aktywować.
If not activated within 24 hours the pla: Jeśli platforma nie zostanie aktywowana w ciągu 24 godzin to zostanie ona automatycznie skasowana.
You are connecting to the server without: Łączysz się z węzłem nieanonimowo, ten węzeł zezwala wyłącznie zgłoszenia anonimowe
We will try to get back to you as soon a: Spróbujemy się skontaktować z tobą tak szybko, jak to możliwe.
Zapamiętaj swoje potwierdzenie dla tego zgłoszenia.
Use the 16 digit receipt to log in. It w: Użyj 16-cyfrowego kodu potwierdzenia by się zalogować. Pozwoli ci on zobaczyć każdą wiadomość, którą ci wysłaliśmy, a także dodać dodatkowe informacje.
In this step the answers to the followin: W tym kroku odpowiedzi na następujące pytania są nieprawidłowe bądź nie ma ich wcale:
The following step-by-step procedure wil: The following step-by-step procedure will guide you through creating your whistleblowing platform.
These profiles contain settings used by: These profiles contain settings used by successful projects in each respective field.
The user will receive an activation link: The user will receive an activation link via email.
Please review the license terms before p: Please review the license terms before proceeding.
I have read and agree to the terms of th: I have read and agree to the terms of the License Agreement.
You have completed the platform wizard.
Describe your report in a few words.
Do you want to provide your identificati: Do you want to provide your identification information?
Job title at the time of the reported fa: Stanowisko w czasie, gdy działa się sytuacja, którą zgłaszasz
Job responsibility (role) at the time of: Zakres obowiązków (zadania) w czasie, gdy działa się sytuacja, którą zgłaszasz
Organization unit and job location at th: Miejsce i instytucja Twojej pracy w czasie, którego dotyczy zgłoszenie
You're receiving this email because a us: You're receiving this email because a user account has been created for you on the system: {Site}
Please click on the activation link to p: Please click on the activation link to proceed with the account activation and to set your user password.
This link will expire in 3 days.
After successful activation you will be: After successful activation you will be able to access the system via the following link: {LoginUrl}
Your whistleblowing platform is now acce: Your whistleblowing platform is now accessible at:
The platform will be automatically delet: The platform will be automatically deleted on:
The number of activities recently detect: The number of activities recently detected appears to be higher than usual.
This could be a sign of an attack (for e: This could be a sign of an attack (for example, someone flooding your server with bogus information) or just a usage spike due to an increased visibility of your project.
Examine the issue to determine whether i: Examine the issue to determine whether it is legitimate or not.
The activities with unusual stats are:: The activities with unusual stats are:
The server cannot guarantee that a new r: The server cannot guarantee that a new report can be stored, so submissions have been disabled.
Please consider asking your technical su: Please consider asking your technical support to create more disk space on the server.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: GlobaLeaks technology includes a server status checking component which will alert you in case something requires your attention.
For more information, log in to the Admi: For more information, log in to the Administration interface and look at the "System Stats" and "Anomalies" sections.
This is an email to inform you that the: This is an email to inform you that the PGP key of the following users is going to expire or has already expired:
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Without a valid PGP key, the system will not be able to send them encrypted notifications.
A new whistleblowing site has been regis: A new whistleblowing site has been registered.
This is a test email sent out from the p: This is a test email sent out from the platform's administrative interface.
Reception of this email indicates that t: Reception of this email indicates that the server was able to authenticate to and interact with the SMTP mail server.
This is an email to notify you of a new: This is an email to notify you of a new comment on an existing report.
This is an email to notify you that a re: This is an email to notify you that a request has been made to change your email address to {NewEmailAddress}.
Click the following link to validate thi: Click the following link to validate this change:
If you didn't request this change, chang: If you didn't request this change, change your password and contact your system administrator.
This is an email to notify you that the: This is an email to notify you that the whistleblower of report {TipNum} has attached new material.
The HTTPS certificate loaded on the plat: The HTTPS certificate loaded on the platform is about to, or has already expired.
Without a valid certificate, the platfor: Without a valid certificate, the platform will be accessible in a secure way only via Tor.
Log in to solve the issue.
The automatic HTTPS certificate renewal: The automatic HTTPS certificate renewal scheduled for today just failed.
This is an email to notify you that a cu: This is an email to notify you that a custodian has authorized you to access to the whistleblowing identity for the report {TipNum}.
This is an email to notify you that a custodian has denied you access to the wistleblowing identity for the report {TipNum}.
This is an email to notify you that a re: This is an email to notify you that a recipient has requested access to the whistleblower's identity for the report {TipNum}
The request can be accessed at:: The request can be accessed at:
New request of access to a whistleblower: New request of access to a whistleblower's identity
This is an email to notify you that the: This is an email to notify you that the whistleblower for the report {TipNum} has provided their identity.
The whistleblower has provided their ide: The whistleblower has provided their identity
This is an email to notify you of a new: This is an email to notify you of a new message on an existing report.
You're receiving this email because a pa: You're receiving this email because a password reset has been requested for the account: {Username}
If you didn't make this request, you may: If you didn't make this request, you may safely ignore and delete this email.
You can confirm your request by clicking: You can confirm your request by clicking the following link:
This is an email to inform you that your: To jest powiadomienie o tym, że twój klucz PGP niebawem wygasa lub już stracił ważność
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the platform, or upload a new key.
Without a valid PGP key, the system won': Without a valid PGP key, the system won't be able to encrypt data provided to you.
Click the link to activate the platform:: Click the link to activate the platform:
It is good security practice to keep the: It is good security practice to keep the platform up to date.
To learn about new features and bug fixe: To learn about new features and bug fixes in the new version consult the change log at: {ChangeLogUrl}
For instructions on software updates, pl: For instructions on software updates, please refer to the documentation at: {UpdateGuideUrl}
Please remember to check them before the: Please remember to check them before they are deleted.
This is an email to notify you that a wh: This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient of their report.
You are asked to pay special attention t: You are asked to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in the interest of the public. Therefore the material provided within this report should be considered to be of high importance.
